creditline: Gift of Janet H. Spokes in memory of her parents, Angelica and Ignatius Houley
description: two horizontal images; cartoonish figures with large heads; top image: photographer behind black cloth at left; man wearing a high white collar seated in a chair; woman wearing white cap, red blouse and blue skirt at center; bottom image: seated man with his head held high at left, leaning his PR elbow on a table with a blue tablecloth; photographer at right in plaid coat, adjusting his camera
portfolio: From (Croquis Parisiens, no. 2), from Le Charivari, March 31, 1853
signed: LRC in the print, in black: [h.D.]
title: Pose de l'homme de la nature... Pose de l'homme civilisé. (Croquis Parisiens No. 2), from Le Charivari
